en-US.importGameDescr: Importing a previously exported game means you will start a new game, losing all of your current achievements and progress. This cannot be undone!
en-US.errorImportingGame: Could not import game, file does not appear to be a valid gamefile or has been corrupted.
en-US.resetGameDescr: Resetting your game means you will start a new game, losing all of your current achievements and progress. This cannot be undone!
